definitions.definition: Foolishly or unreasoningly fond of, attracted to or in love with (someone); besotted ,
Excessively fond of or enthusiastic about (something).
Foolish , stupid , lacking good judgment (often as a result of some external influence).

main_definition: Foolishly or unreasoningly fond of, attracted to or in love with (someone); besotted ,
secondary_definitions: Excessively fond of or enthusiastic about (something).
( obsolete ) Foolish , stupid , lacking good judgment (often as a result of some external influence).
